Data Fields
hwpl_action_t Struct Reference

#include <types.h>

Collaboration diagram for hwpl_action_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines an action to take when an asynchronous event occurs (such as a pin change interrupt).

See Also
I_SETACTION

Data Fields

uint8_t channel
 The channel (a GPIO pin or timer channel)
 
int event
 The peripheral specific event.
 
hwpl_callback_t callback
 The function to call. First argument is the context, second argument is peripheral specific.
 
void * context
 The context to execute the callback in.
